official_title: To amend the Merchant Marine Act of 1936 to authorize use of amounts in capital construction funds for compliance with fishing vessel safety, environmental, seafood wholesomeness, and other requirements.
short_title: Fishing Vessel Safety and Environmental Compliance Act of 1991

summary.text: Fishing Vessel Safety and Environmental Compliance Act of 1991 - Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 to allow the use of amounts in capital construction funds for purchasing equipment or modifying a qualified vessel to comply with: (1) requirements under the Commercial Fishing Industry Vessel Safety Act; (2) Federal environmental laws; or (3) laws and regulations, including those relating to fishing vessel safety and the wholesomeness of seafood. Allows existing capital construction fund agreements to be amended on request to authorize such uses.

titles.title: Fishing Vessel Safety and Environmental Compliance Act of 1991

To amend the Merchant Marine Act of 1936 to authorize use of amounts in capital construction funds for compliance with fishing vessel safety, environmental, seafood wholesomeness, and other requirements.
